title: ZAC style skins!
body: the basic idea is to replace every champion with ZAC taking their forms! so for example ZAC Ziggs! all abilities would be little ZAC explosions, q being a ZAC head, w an angry lil' ZAC, e many zac blobs and his r mega death ZAC! all of which are green gooey things of mass destruction! i hope this becomes a reality! there are so many champions id like to see ZAC become!

replies.body: This could be a fantastic April Fools gimmick.
What, while URF is taking place??? No thx...
URF is a giant mess anyway this just keeps it one colour!
Bubblegum TF and Gravy Graves (or Gravesy)
But bubblegum TF wouldn't look anything like his identical 8 skins -_- Haha
